parameters.name: Email
parameters.description:
The email address.

>  If you set `VerifyType` to `email`, you must specify this parameter.

parameters.name: MobilePhone
parameters.description:
The mobile phone number.

>  If you set `VerifyType` to `sms`, you must specify this parameter.

parameters.name: UserPrincipalName
parameters.description: The logon name of the RAM user.

parameters.name: VerifyType
parameters.description:
The multi-factor authentication (MFA) method. Valid values:

*   sms: mobile phone.
*   email: email.
